QuestData.Title: Securing the Perimeter
QuestData.Description: The saronite bombs are in place, $n. We're only going to get one shot at this, however. Let's make it count.$B$BWe need temporary control of the area for a safe detonation. Let's try to put a dent in the Scourge's numbers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Kendall at Icecrown Citadel wants you to slay 10 Hulking Horrors.
QuestData.RewardText: You're as good as Thassarian said. Good job!
